verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> But Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

ל֗וּ <WH3863> Oh that שָׁק֣וֹל <WH8254> were throughly יִשָּׁקֵ֣ל <WH8254> weighed כַּעְשִׂ֑י <WH3708> my grief [וְהַיָּתִי כ] (וְ֝הַוָּתִ֗י <WH1962> calamity ק) בְּֽמֹאזְנַ֥יִם <WH3976> in the balances יִשְׂאוּ־ <WH5375> laid יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> together

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> then מֵח֣וֹל <WH2344> than the sand יַמִּ֣ים <WH3220> of the sea יִכְבָּ֑ד <WH3513> For now it would be heavier עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֝֗ן <WH3651> after that דְּבָרַ֥י <WH1697> therefore my words לָֽעוּ׃ <WH3886> are swallowed up

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For חִצֵּ֪י <WH2671> For the arrows שַׁדַּ֡י <WH7706> of the Almighty עִמָּדִ֗י <WH5978> [are] within אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> me חֲ֭מָתָם <WH2534> me the poison שֹׁתָ֣ה <WH8354> whereof drinketh up רוּחִ֑י <WH7307> my spirit בִּעוּתֵ֖י <WH1161> the terrors אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> of God יַֽעַרְכֽוּנִי׃ <WH6186> do set themselves in array

הֲיִֽנְהַק־ <WH5101> bray פֶּ֥רֶא <WH6501> Doth the wild ass עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> over דֶ֑שֶׁא <WH1877> grass אִ֥ם <WH518> Or יִגְעֶה־ <WH1600> low שּׁ֝֗וֹר <WH7794> the ox עַל־ <WH5921> over בְּלִילֽוֹ׃ <WH1098> corn

הֲיֵאָכֵ֣ל <WH398> be eaten תָּ֭פֵל <WH8602> Can that which is unsavoury מִבְּלִי־ <WH1097> without מֶ֑לַח <WH4417> salt אִם־ <WH518> Or יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> is there טַ֝֗עַם <WH2940> [any] taste בְּרִ֣יר <WH7388> in the white חַלָּמֽוּת׃ <WH2495> the white
מֵאֲנָ֣ה <WH3985> refused לִנְגּ֣וֹעַ <WH5060> to touch נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> The things [that] my soul הֵ֝֗מָּה <WH1992> are like כִּדְוֵ֥י <WH1741> [are] as my sorrowful לַחְמִֽי׃ <WH3899> meat

מִֽי־ <WH4310> would יִ֭תֵּן <WH5414> would grant תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> Oh that I might have שֶֽׁאֱלָתִ֑י <WH7596> my request וְ֝תִקְוָתִ֗י <WH8615> [me] the thing that I long for יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> grant אֱלֽוֹהַּ׃ <WH433> and that God

וְיֹאֵ֣ל <WH2974> Even that it would please אֱ֭לוֹהַּ <WH433> God וִֽידַכְּאֵ֑נִי <WH1792> to destroy יַתֵּ֥ר <WH5425> me that he would let loose יָ֝ד֗וֹ <WH3027> his hand וִֽיבַצְּעֵֽנִי׃ <WH1214> and cut me off

וּ֥תְהִי <WH1961> become ע֨וֹד ׀ <WH5750> is still נֶ֘חָ֤מָתִ֗י <WH5165> Then should I yet have comfort וַאֲסַלְּדָ֣ה <WH5539> yea I would harden בְ֭חִילָה <WH2427> myself in sorrow לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יַחְמ֑וֹל <WH2550> let him not spare כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> have not כִ֝חַ֗דְתִּי <WH3582> for I have not concealed אִמְרֵ֥י <WH561> the words קָדֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH6918> of the Holy One

מַה־ <WH4100> What כֹּחִ֥י <WH3581> What [is] my strength כִֽי־ <WH3588> should אֲיַחֵ֑ל <WH3176> that I should hope וּמַה־ <WH4100> What קִּ֝צִּ֗י <WH7093> ? and what [is] mine end כִּֽי־ <WH3588> should אַאֲרִ֥יךְ <WH748> that I should prolong נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> any
אִם־ <WH518> Or כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> [Is] my strength אֲבָנִ֣ים <WH68> of stones כֹּחִ֑י <WH3581> the strength אִֽם־ <WH518> Or בְּשָׂרִ֥י <WH1320> is my flesh נָחֽוּשׁ׃ <WH5153> of brass
הַאִ֬ם <WH518> lo אֵ֣ין <WH369> is not עֶזְרָתִ֣י <WH5833> [Is] not my help בִ֑י וְ֝תֻשִׁיָּ֗ה <WH8454> in me? and is wisdom נִדְּחָ֥ה <WH5080> driven quite מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> For

לַמָּ֣ס <WH4523> To him that is afflicted מֵרֵעֵ֣הוּ <WH7453> [should be shewed] from his friend חָ֑סֶד <WH2617> pity וְיִרְאַ֖ת <WH3374> the fear שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> of the Almighty יַעֲזֽוֹב׃ <WH5800> but he forsaketh

אַ֭חַי <WH251> My brethren בָּגְד֣וּ <WH898> have dealt deceitfully כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> like נָ֑חַל <WH5158> as a brook כַּאֲפִ֖יק <WH650> [and] as the stream נְחָלִ֣ים <WH5158> of brooks יַעֲבֹֽרוּ׃ <WH5674> they pass away
הַקֹּדְרִ֥ים <WH6937> Which are blackish מִנִּי־ <WH4480> because קָ֑רַח <WH7140> by reason of the ice עָ֝לֵ֗ימוֹ <WH5921> and יִתְעַלֶּם־ <WH5956> is hid שָֽׁלֶג׃ <WH7950> [and] wherein the snow

בְּ֭עֵת <WH6256> What time יְזֹרְב֣וּ <WH2215> they wax warm נִצְמָ֑תוּ <WH6789> they vanish בְּ֝חֻמּ֗וֹ <WH2527> when it is hot נִדְעֲכ֥וּ <WH1846> they are consumed out מִמְּקוֹמָֽם׃ <WH4725> of their place
יִ֭לָּ֣פְתוּ <WH3943> are turned aside אָרְח֣וֹת <WH734> The paths דַּרְכָּ֑ם <WH1870> of their way יַעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> they go בַתֹּ֣הוּ <WH8414> to nothing וְיֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <WH6> and perish
הִ֭בִּיטוּ <WH5027> looked אָרְח֣וֹת <WH734> The troops תֵּמָ֑א <WH8485> of Tema הֲלִיכֹ֥ת <WH1979> the companies שְׁ֝בָ֗א <WH7614> of Sheba קִוּוּ־ <WH6960> waited לָֽמוֹ׃
בֹּ֥שׁוּ <WH954> They were confounded כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָטָ֑ח <WH982> because they had hoped בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> they came עָ֝דֶ֗יהָ <WH5704> there וַיֶּחְפָּֽרוּ׃ <WH2659> thither and were ashamed

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed עַ֭תָּה <WH6258> have now הֱיִ֣יתֶם <WH1961> become [לֹא כ] (לֹ֑ו <WH3808> not ק) תִּֽרְא֥וּ <WH7200> For now ye are nothing ye see חֲ֝תַ֗ת <WH2866> [my] casting down וַתִּירָֽאוּ׃ <WH3372> and are afraid
הֲ‍ֽכִי־ <WH3588> for אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> Did I say הָ֣בוּ <WH3051> Bring לִ֑י וּ֝מִכֹּחֲכֶ֗ם <WH3581> ability שִׁחֲד֥וּ <WH7809> unto me? or Give a reward בַעֲדִֽי׃ <WH1157> about
וּמַלְּט֥וּנִי <WH4422> Or Deliver מִיַּד־ <WH3027> me from the hand צָ֑ר <WH6862> me from the enemy's וּמִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> the hand עָרִיצִ֣ים <WH6184> mighty תִּפְדּֽוּנִי׃ <WH6299> deliver

ה֭וֹרוּנִי <WH3384> Teach וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אַחֲרִ֑ישׁ <WH2790> me and I will hold my tongue וּמַה־ <WH4100> how שָּׁ֝גִ֗יתִי <WH7686> wherein I have erred הָבִ֥ינוּ <WH995> and cause me to understand לִֽי׃

מַה־ <WH4100> How נִּמְרְצ֥וּ <WH4834> How forcible אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> words יֹ֑שֶׁר <WH3476> are right וּמַה־ <WH4100> what יּוֹכִ֖יחַ <WH3198> but what doth your arguing הוֹכֵ֣חַ <WH3198> reprove מִכֶּֽם׃ <WH4480> at

הַלְהוֹכַ֣ח <WH3198> to reprove מִלִּ֣ים <WH4405> words תַּחְשֹׁ֑בוּ <WH2803> Do ye imagine וּ֝לְר֗וּחַ <WH7307> air אִמְרֵ֥י <WH561> and the speeches נֹאָֽשׁ׃ <WH2976> of one that is desperate אַף־ <WH637> yet עַל־ <WH5921> for
יָת֥וֹם <WH3490> the fatherless תַּפִּ֑ילוּ <WH5307> Yea ye overwhelm וְ֝תִכְר֗וּ <WH3738> and ye dig עַל־ <WH5921> over רֵֽיעֲכֶֽם׃ <WH7453> [a pit] for your friend

וְ֭עַתָּה <WH6258> Now הוֹאִ֣ילוּ <WH2974> Now therefore be content פְנוּ־ <WH6437> look בִ֑י וְעַל־ <WH5921> unto פְּ֝נֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6440> upon me for [it is] evident אִם־ <WH518> and if אֲכַזֵּֽב׃ <WH3576> unto you if I lie

שֻֽׁבוּ־ <WH7725> Return נָ֭א <WH4994> now אַל־ <WH408> Let there be no תְּהִ֣י <WH1961> become עַוְלָ֑ה <WH5766> I pray you let it not be iniquity [וְשֻׁבִי כ] (וְשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> Desist ק) ע֝וֹד <WH5750> is yet צִדְקִי־ <WH6664> my righteousness בָֽהּ׃
הֲיֵשׁ־ <WH3426> Is there בִּלְשׁוֹנִ֥י <WH3956> babbler עַוְלָ֑ה <WH5766> iniquity אִם־ <WH518> lo חִ֝כִּ֗י <WH2441> my palate לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָבִ֥ין <WH995> discern הַוּֽוֹת׃ <WH1942> calamity
